column5: LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION!!! This Bay front home is a great place for a family retreat and/or a week or two of great fishing. Sunis new to the vacation market having never been offered before. This 3 bed/2 bath up and 1 bed/1 bath down sleeps 8 comfortably. For family and friends looking for togetherness and value it can accommodate up to 12 family and friends.
